results.description: Momentum on the high-userCount hedge score. Applied SUGGESTION3: coverage <0.6 so ts_backfill used. SUGGESTION1: single-field (didn't combine) because the hc_hedge has very high userCount/alphaCount (strong community signal) per SUGGESTION4. SUGGESTION2 (vector) not applicable. Confidence set to 0.72 because strong crowd use and clear time-series momentum evidence.

Short-term momentum on linear model score (non-hc). Applied ts_backfill due to coverage <0.6. I used this single field because oth335_combined_all_region_linear has very high userCount/alphaCount (SUGGESTION4). Vector op not used. Confidence 0.70 given broad adoption.

results.idea: Hedge minus Linear (model spread, hc vs combined)
results.description: Cross-model spread: hc_hedge minus combined_linear to capture model divergence. Applied SUGGESTION1 by combining two fields. Applied ts_backfill to both (SUGGESTION3). SUGGESTION4: chose fields with high counts (hc_hedge high; combined_linear high). SUGGESTION2 not applicable. Confidence 0.65 for diversification potential.

Mean-reversion signal on final composite MIND (combined). Applied ts_backfill (coverage <0.6). Used ts_av_diff to capture deviation from recent mean. Did not combine other fields to keep implementation simple; SUGGESTION4 satisfied by using high alphaCount field. Vector not relevant. Confidence 0.68.

Momentum on SHIELD model (hc). Used ts_backfill for coverage. Single-field because SHIELD provides orthogonal model signal; SUGGESTION4 moderate userCount applied. Vector not applied. Confidence 0.62.

Spread between hc hedge and hc shield to capture disagreement among internal models. Applied SUGGESTION1 combining two hc fields; ts_backfill applied to both (SUGGESTION3). SUGGESTION4: both fields have decent userCount. Vector not used. Confidence 0.64.

Tilt MIND signal by inverse market cap to favor smaller companies. SUGGESTION1: used two fields (MIND and MKTcap). SUGGESTION3: both backfilled. SUGGESTION4: chose combined MIND for higher userCount; mktcap has lower counts but essential for size tilt. Vector not applicable. Confidence 0.60.

Mean-reversion on hc linear score: recent z-score negative indicates buy. Applied ts_backfill (SUGGESTION3). Single-field chosen despite SUGGESTION1 because hc_linear has clear pattern; SUGGESTION4 moderate userCount. Vector ignored. Confidence 0.58.

Average of the three hc model scores to form consensus. SUGGESTION1: multiple fields used (3 fields) but KEEP_IN_MIND2 allows only up to 2 datafields — adjusted to two-field rolling consensus (hedge & linear) to comply. Applied ts_backfill to both. SUGGESTION2 vector not applicable. Confidence 0.66.

Difference between combined linear and combined MIND to capture model disagreement. Both fields backfilled (SUGGESTION3) and chosen for high user/alpha counts (SUGGESTION4). Vector not used. Confidence 0.63.

Scale SHIELD signal by recent magnitude of hedge score to favor stocks where hedge model also shows conviction. Used two fields (SUGGESTION1) and ts_backfill on both (SUGGESTION3). SUGGESTION4: used hc_hedge for higher counts. Confidence 0.61.

Information ratio of recent returns of the hc_hedge score (ts_ir) to identify stable predictive series. Applied ts_backfill due to coverage. Single-field used given robust alphaCount (SUGGESTION4). SUGGESTION2 not relevant. Confidence 0.67.

results.idea: Correlation between Hedge and Linear (short window)
results.description: Low correlation indicates model diversification opportunities. Applied ts_backfill to both fields; used ts_corr. SUGGESTION1 and SUGGESTION3 applied. SUGGESTION4: picked high-count fields. Confidence 0.55 because correlation is descriptive but can signal trades when extreme.

Cross-sectional zscore of combined linear to build relative bets. Applied ts_backfill for coverage and then zscore (quantile/normalize type). SUGGESTION1 not used (single field) because high userCount. Vector irrelevant. Confidence 0.66.

Use winsorize on combined MIND to reduce extreme model noise before ranking. Applied ts_backfill then winsorize. SUGGESTION1 single field acceptable; SUGGESTION4 used high-count MIND. Confidence 0.59.
Short-term reversal based on 3-day ts_rank low -> buy. ts_backfill applied. SUGGESTION1 single-field choice due to strong usage. SUGGESTION2 not applicable. Confidence 0.57.

Scale linear score by inverse of its recent ts_std_dev to prefer stable signals. Both ts_backfill and ts_std_dev used (SUGGESTION3). Single-field accepted due to high counts (SUGGESTION4). Confidence 0.64.

Detect jump by ts_max_diff on hc_hedge; large negative ts_max_diff may indicate recent drop from a peak -> mean-revert. ts_backfill applied. SUGGESTION1 single-field used; SUGGESTION4 high counts. Confidence 0.56.

Spread between shield and mind (combined) to capture orthogonal model disagreement. Two fields combined (SUGGESTION1) and backfilled (SUGGESTION3). Chose combined MIND/SHIELD due to higher counts. Confidence 0.60.
Momentum on hc MIND score using ts_returns -> zscore. Applied ts_backfill. Single-field chosen due to decent userCount (SUGGESTION4). SUGGESTION1 single-field accepted. Confidence 0.61.
Weighted sum: favor linear but add shield as confirmation. Two fields used (SUGGESTION1) with ts_backfill. Kept operators minimal. Chose combined_linear for high alphaCount. Confidence 0.62.

Combine ts_ir and absolute zscore magnitude to prefer stable & strong signals. Single field used (SUGGESTION1) with ts_backfill (SUGGESTION3). High userCount field chosen (SUGGESTION4). Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: Cross-model rank aggregate (combined linear vs combined mind)
results.description: Rank aggregate by subtracting ranks: combined_linear rank minus combined_mind rank to find relative over/under. Used two fields and ts_backfill both (SUGGESTION1/3). SUGGESTION4: picks high-count fields. Confidence 0.60.

results.idea: Hedge short-term mean reversion with winsorize
results.description: Short mean-reversion on hc_hedge after winsorizing to reduce outliers. ts_backfill applied. SUGGESTION2 not relevant. SUGGESTION4: high userCount field used. Confidence 0.59.

Divide shield score by market cap to tilt small caps in shield predictions. Two fields used and backfilled. SUGGESTION4: shield has moderate counts; mktcap low but necessary. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.54.
Detect breakout by comparing ts_delta to recent ts_std_dev of hc_linear. ts_backfill used for coverage. Single-field chosen due to direct signal. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: Composite momentum: avg(zscore hedge, zscore linear)
results.description: Average z-scores of hc_hedge and combined_linear to get consensus momentum. SUGGESTION1 used (two fields) and ts_backfill on both (SUGGESTION3). SUGGESTION4: both chosen for counts. Confidence 0.67.
Short reversal if shield has abrupt change: use ts_arg_max/arg_min surrogate via ts_arg_min of recent period. Applied ts_backfill. Kept single-field. Confidence 0.53.

Ratio between hc_hedge and combined_hedge to find stocks where internal hc model deviates from combined model. Two fields used and backfilled per SUGGESTION3. SUGGESTION4: both have decent counts. Confidence 0.58.
Short-term reversal on combined_linear using cross-sectional ts_rank over 5 days then invert. ts_backfill applied. Single-field used for clarity. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: MIND momentum scaled by HC hedge
results.description: Multiply combined MIND momentum by hc hedge zscore to emphasize consistent signals across models. Two fields used and backfilled (SUGGESTION1/3). Chosen for higher counts. Confidence 0.62.

Use trade_when to apply hc_hedge signal only if market cap above/below threshold (backfilled). Two fields used; ts_backfill applied (SUGGESTION3). SUGGESTION1 used to combine signal and filter. Confidence 0.50 due to small-cap noise.
Spread between shield and linear (combined) zscores to find model contradictions. Both backfilled (SUGGESTION3) and selected for counts (SUGGESTION4). Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: HC Linear vs HC MIND concordance
results.description: Compare hc_linear and hc_mind zscores; concordant extremes are stronger. Two fields used and ts_backfill applied. SUGGESTION4: hc fields chosen for internal consistency. Confidence 0.63.
Dampen combined hedge by its recent hump (reduce turnover) using hump operator. Applied ts_backfill then hump. SUGGESTION1 single-field; SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: HC Shield trend persistence (ts_count_nans for coverage)
results.description: Use ts_count_nans to measure recent coverage gaps and avoid low-coverage streaks; ts_backfill applied then ts_count_nans. SUGGESTION3 used; SUGGESTION4 moderate. Confidence 0.48 as a filter rather than primary alpha.
Use ts_quantile of hc_hedge to pick extreme quantiles in time-series space. Backfilled due to coverage. SUGGESTION2 not applicable. Confidence 0.60.
Multiply combined_linear and combined_mind zscores to emphasize agreement. Two fields used and backfilled. SUGGESTION4: high-count fields. Confidence 0.61.
Only trade hc_hedge when recent stddev below threshold (stable signals). Applied ts_backfill and ts_std_dev with trade_when. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.52.
Use ts_kurtosis to find abnormal distribution days for combined_linear; backfilled then ts_kurtosis. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.49 (exploratory).
Use kth_element to backfill from most recent valid value and then require lagged confirmation via ts_delay. SUGGESTION3 used explicitly. SUGGESTION1 single-field. Confidence 0.54.
Cross-sectional zscore of shield after backfill to create relative bets. SUGGESTION3 applied. Single-field used; SUGGESTION4 moderate counts. Confidence 0.60.
Scale hc_mind by inverse of its recent ts_std_dev to overweight stable predictive names. ts_backfill applied. Single-field strategy leveraging SUGGESTION4. Confidence 0.62.
If combined_linear had its local minimum recently, expect rebound (ts_arg_min signal). ts_backfill applied. Confidence 0.55.
Only trade hc_hedge when hc_shield agrees in sign (multiply signs). Two fields used and backfilled. SUGGESTION1/3 applied. Confidence 0.63.
Ratio of combined MIND to combined Linear zscores — identify when MIND strongly outperforms linear. Two fields and ts_backfill applied. SUGGESTION4 used high-count fields. Confidence 0.58.
Trade only top percentile of hc_hedge ts_rank (5 days). ts_backfill applied. SUGGESTION1 single-field. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: HC Linear & Combined Shield pair spread
results.description: Pair spread between hc_linear and combined_shield to capture relative mispricing. Two fields used and backfilled. SUGGESTION4 picks hc_linear for internal signal. Confidence 0.57.
Winsorize combined MIND then apply momentum zscore to avoid outliers. ts_backfill used. Single-field used for simplicity. Confidence 0.60.
Multiply hc_hedge zscore by recent ts_returns to prefer names with both signal and realized short-term movement consistency. ts_backfill applied. Confidence 0.63.
Short when combined_linear zscore is strongly negative and mktcap above threshold to avoid microcap noise. Two fields used, ts_backfill applied. SUGGESTION4: linear has high counts. Confidence 0.51.
Use ts_product of short returns of combined_shield to find persistent trends; backfilled. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.50 (exploratory).
hc_hedge minus hc_mind zscore to find internal signal conflict. Both backfilled (SUGGESTION3). Chosen hc fields per SUGGESTION4. Confidence 0.62.
Tilt combined_linear by scaled inverse mktcap to overweight smaller names gently. Two fields used and backfilled. SUGGESTION4: linear prioritized. Confidence 0.55.
Mean-reversion on hc_hedge deviation from its 20-day mean via ts_av_diff. ts_backfill applied. SUGGESTION4: used high-count hc_hedge. Confidence 0.58.
Quantile transform combined_linear (gaussian) cross-section after backfill to produce stable ranks. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.65.
Spread between combined_shield and combined_hedge zscores to capture model momentum divergence. Two fields used and backfilled. Confidence 0.58.
Apply ts_decay_linear to hc_linear to reduce noise and turnover (backfilled first). SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.56.
Multiply combined_mind and combined_shield zscores to emphasize agreement. Two fields and ts_backfill used. SUGGESTION4: both have reasonable counts. Confidence 0.61.
Scale hc_hedge zscore by inverse of hc_mktcap to favor smaller names in hc universe. Two fields used with backfill (SUGGESTION3). Confidence 0.57.
Use crossover logic: rank(5d) > rank(20d) indicates uptrend. Implemented via subtracting two ts_rank measures after backfill. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.54.
Short names where hc_shield shows sudden volatility spike (high ts_std_dev) after backfill filter. Two operators only. Confidence 0.49 as risky.
Cross-sectional zscore of combined_hedge (backfilled) to identify relative winners. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.63.
Use recent ts_corr between combined_linear and combined_hedge; extreme low corr indicates divergence to exploit. Both backfilled. Confidence 0.52.
Multiply hc_mind zscore by inverse stddev to prefer stable, strong hc_mind signals. ts_backfill used. Confidence 0.60.
Require combined_shield and combined_linear to agree in sign: multiply zscores after backfill. SUGGESTION1/3 used. Confidence 0.62.
Short names where hc_hedge is at local maximum (ts_arg_max==0) expecting mean-reversion. ts_backfill applied. Confidence 0.53.
Use ts_count_nans on combined_linear to avoid names with erratic availability; backfilled then filtered. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.47 as filter-only alpha.
If combined_mind significantly exceeds combined_shield (spread), expect correction. Two fields used, both backfilled. Confidence 0.56.
ts_sum of hc_hedge over 10 days to capture persistent directional conviction. ts_backfill applied. SUGGESTION4: picked high count field. Confidence 0.60.
Apply ts_scale to combined_linear to compress to [0,1] over 20 days after backfill, used for bucketed strategies. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.58.
Difference between short and long zscore of hc_shield to detect momentum shift. ts_backfill applied. Confidence 0.55.
Normalize combined_hedge by its recent stddev to make cross-sectional scores comparable. ts_backfill applied. Confidence 0.61.
Product of combined_linear and combined_hedge zscores to favor double-confirmation. Two fields and backfill applied. Confidence 0.64.
If hc_mind shows high kurtosis recently, avoid extreme bets (filter). ts_backfill and ts_kurtosis used. Confidence 0.46 as conservative filter.

results.idea: Shield normalized by group (proxy via market-cap bucket)
results.description: Approximate group neutrality by scaling shield by mktcap bucket; used bucket-like divide by mktcap after backfill. SUGGESTION4 used available mktcap. Confidence 0.52.
Use ts_mean of hc_hedge to capture medium-term trend after backfill. Single-field applied. Confidence 0.59.
Compare combined_linear vs hc_linear to capture where aggregate differs from hc internal model. Two fields used and backfilled (SUGGESTION1/3). Confidence 0.57.
Cross-sectional zscore of combined_mind multiplied by inverse of recent stddev to overweight stable names. ts_backfill applied. Confidence 0.60.
ts_ir on combined_shield to find names with high historic signal/noise ratio; backfilled. SUGGESTION4 moderate. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: HC Hedge returns vs Linear returns correlation
results.description: ts_corr of ts_returns of hc_hedge and combined_linear to find where return behaviors diverge. Used ts_backfill on both (SUGGESTION3). Confidence 0.50.

results.idea: Shield short when rank too high
results.description: Short names with extremely high combined_shield cross-sectional rank after backfill. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.54.
Weighted average of hc_hedge and hc_mind (0.6/0.4) after backfill to form composite signal. SUGGESTION1/3 applied. Confidence 0.65.
Use ts_arg_max and ts_arg_min difference to measure trend strength for combined_linear after backfill. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.48.
Detect impulsive moves in combined_shield via ts_delta and use sign for trade direction after backfill. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.51.

results.idea: HC Hedge mean reversion with quantile cutoff
results.description: Reverse combined hc_hedge when it lies in extreme quantiles (ts_quantile) after backfill. SUGGESTION3 used. Confidence 0.58.
Cross-sectional zscore of combined_linear divided by its ts_std_dev to reduce weight on unstable names. ts_backfill applied. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: HC MIND vs Combined MIND spread
results.description: Difference between hc_mind and combined_mind to find internal-external disagreement. Two fields and ts_backfill used. SUGGESTION4: both available. Confidence 0.56.
Accumulate hc_hedge over 5 days via ts_sum after backfill to capture short persistent moves. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.60.
Scale combined_linear zscore by combined_shield zscore to emphasize mutual confirmation. Two fields used and backfilled. Confidence 0.62.
Apply MIND signal only if mktcap above a threshold to reduce microcap risk. Two fields used and backfilled. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.49 (filter-focused).
Apply winsorize to hc_hedge then momentum zscore to reduce outliers. ts_backfill used. SUGGESTION4: high-count field. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: Linear volatility breakout filter using group of mktcap (proxy)
results.description: Detect linear breakout but only if mktcap within range to control risk; used trade_when and backfill for both fields. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.50.
Require both hc_shield and combined_shield to have same sign and magnitude: multiply their zscores after backfill. SUGGESTION1/3 used. Confidence 0.63.
If combined_linear is far below its recent max (ts_max_diff large), expect mean-reversion. ts_backfill applied. Confidence 0.55.
Bucket hc_hedge rank into groups to create discrete exposures using bucket operator after backfill. SUGGESTION3 applied; SUGGESTION1 single-field. Confidence 0.58.
Difference of short and long ts_mean of combined_shield to detect early cross with linear; implemented with two ts_mean differences after backfill. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.53.
